channel.title: Hehehe :) still need help quick with sony ericsson frames :D
channel.description:
hey i need some help with sony frames
1. where can i find the sony ericsson frames on my phone? like if i want to send them. 2. i was having a nokia 6131 before this sony ericsson and there was a map where i could put frames but in sony there isnt one. so where can i put my old frames from my nokia to the sony? and where can i find frames on the internett?
please help me fast

? how could i ever get that to be a frame on my phone ?

item.title: Hehehe :) still need help quick with sony ericsson frames :D
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

Uriko:

i’ve owned SE’s for years now and I have no clue what you’re talking about, for pictures?

ok i will explain. i am taking a picture and then i want a frame to that picture.
but i dont want that frames i got. so how can i download more frames for my phone?
and where should i paste the frames? in wich folder on my phone?

Davidude:

Really didn’t need two threads for this. You should have used your old one. I’ll lock the old one.

sorry i will remember that to the next time

Read full topic
